phrases: I walk through the white pages of my storybook
that is just waiting to be painted
with a kaleidoscope of my experiences
aa yawarakakute atatakai kimi no te
Your hand is so warm held within mine
nigiri shimete sono kokoro no oku made todoku you ni
It reaches all the way into my heart
hohoenmi de kumeta nara nigirikaeshite kuretara
I cannot see a brighter future
boku wa tada mae wo miteru
than you smiling and taking my hand as well
The herbs I picked look like they have dried pretty nicely.
Does anyone want to try a taste?
Or you could make Joe drink it later!
The black curtain for the cafe has been ordered and will be delivered.
The mural and the wall poster should be finished on time.
If we only work during school, I do not think we will finish on time.
Hey, Sadako still has not come back.
She looked like she was not feeling too well, but she said not to worry.
Oh, what is that herb you have there?
This is the chameleon plant and Thunberg's geranium.
They are good for treating diuresis and constipation, I think.
Chizu, do you want to try some?
Here Andy, take this one too.
Sorry I have not been able to help out.
You could not have skipped practice!
Yeah, you guys have summer preliminaries right after the school festival, do not you?
Hey, what were doing about the bottom part over here?
Were we going to run wire through it for reinforcement?
I do not know You would have to ask Kazehaya.
It is not like him to skip.
Everyone is already started working, have not they?
I think there was something they needed to ask you.
I guess I was annoying to her after all.
She did not want people to get the wrong idea about us.
I think she felt that all of the things I did for her were making other people suspicious.
I tried to tell her how I feel and how much I care for her, but it did not work out.
I could not hold it in anymore.
It hurts more than I thought it would.
I did not think I was annoying enough to make her cry like that.
Do you think we are friends now or something?
Do not group yourself with me.
More like because you did not try.
Because I could not leave him alone even though he likes someone?
Was not Kazehaya the only one who never looked at you out of pity?
Even though even Chizu and Ayane did!
You are not the same as me.
Even though he rejected me, I clearly told him how I felt!
Do not you dare put yourself on the same level as me!
I have always, always been watching Kazehaya,
It was hayashi rice, was not it?
Sorry for the short notice, but we are meeting at my house to make the costumes for the costume parade.
If you are free, come over!
W-Would it be alright if I went over to Chizu's house right now?
Are you preparing for the school festival?
Ah, I have some snacks for you to take over then.
I remember helping to make our class float back when I was in high school.
Dried bonito and seaweed, big Shiitake mushrooms and dried sea slugs.
It was so hard to cut the Shiitake!
Do not let anyone see us!
I am pretty sure taking your floats out is against the rules.
Pretend you did not see us!
Every other class is doing it!
We will not finish on time otherwise!
Yeah, but I do not really care.
What does he mean by that?!
He is supposed to be our teacher.
Just warning you, you guys better not get caught by another teacher.
I do not want to deal with it.
But what do we do about this?
You are more of a jerk than I thought.
When did you get like that?
You pretend to care, then make the other person care for real...
And yet you look so harmless
You rejected Kuronuma, did not you?!
I cannot believe you went off so fast to reject someone.
Seriously, what do you plan on doing in the future?
I am the one that got rejected!
Did you run over there just to turn her down?
I went to confess to her.
It just did not go well.
So you were not able to really say it.
I said everything I had to!
You said before that you do not understand Kuronuma,
but really, you already have trouble with yourself.
It is fine like this, is not it?
That is because it should probably be like this.
I am going to go bring us some drinks.
Thank you for texting me and inviting me over
and for what you said after school.
How long do you plan on putting yourself down for?
It made me really happy to hear you say that.
Last year, when I first became friends with you and Ayane,
that was the first time I ever felt that someone liked me!
Look how happy she is after hearing you say that.
Did Kazehaya hear me say it?
I showed you such an embarrassing side of me yesterday!
You have really done it now.
What do you want with her?
Did not I tell you not to do anything uncalled for?
I think Kazehaya might actually like you after all!
You have got it all wrong!
That is not like in the way you are thinking of it.
I am not sure, but I think Sadako's denying Kazehaya likes her.
Wait, why are there so many people here?
Oh man, can we finish the float on time?
We will probably have to pull an all-nighter before the festival.
What, it was all just talk!
Yeah, he did not even say hi to her.
I might not be the right person to say this,
but I do not think you are saying enough.
If things keep going like this, will I never be able to talk to Kazehaya again?
Will I only be able to watch him walk away without even saying good morning?
He might never smile and say good morning to me again.
Kazehaya used to be there waiting for me
he used to call out to me when I was all alone.
Do not you take that tone with me!
Should I sew it shut for you?
See, I am a pretty honest fellow.
Cannot you do this somewhere else?
What did you do after that?
After you came to find out what happened between Sadako and Kazehaya.
Kurumi, you are not planning something again, are you?
You did not do anything to Sawako, did you?
What is wrong with telling off a girl who cannot even give a guy chocolates on Valentine's?
Why do you know about that?
She was the one who could not give it to him!
I did not tell her not to give it to him!
Then if I were to go out with Sadako, would not that be good for you?
Do not get ahead of yourself!
Did not you want to get in her way?
I do not want to think that I lost to a girl like her!
I did not think she was so weak!
So Kazehaya really does like Sadako, does not he.
It has nothing to do with you.
Why do you have to say that?
So that you can give yourself the satisfaction of saying I am such a great guy!
Do you know how much Sawako suffered just because of you?
You know how badly outsiders can mess things up.
My eyes really were not open.
douka i am about to dake wa furimukanaide
Please do not look at me right now
The sun's set, the wind's blowing,
and we are so close that we can almost touch
My gaze has always been fixed on you
I do not mind if this emotion is what they call love,
and I do not care if I get hurt by it
I just want to tell you, over and over again
